H0.text: Who set fire to his guitar at the Monterey Pop festival in 19676. Jimi Hendrix's contemporary, Eric Clapton

H1.text: Who set fire to his guitar at the Monterey Pop festival in 19676. The Who's Pete Townshend

H2.text: Who set fire to his guitar at the Monterey Pop festival in 19676. The Doors' Robby Krieger

H3.text: Who set fire to his guitar at the Monterey Pop festival in 19676. Hendrix

A4.text: Jimi Hendrix set his guitar on fire at the 1967 Monterey Pop Festival.

A5.text: Hendrix stated that he decided to destroy his guitar as a sacrifice.
